Katya thought for a moment. It was a ship's shields after all...

Katya: Do we have the weaponry necessary to bring these shields down,
quineg? And after that, to pierce a hole to enter the base?

Her plan started to take shape, but she didn't know the technological
level of her guests well enough to be certain of it.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Assassin <rfa007@c...>"
<rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup thinks for a moment on this.
> 
> Kup: It will take some time, but the shields can be brought down. The 
> structure integrety of a Deflector Shield is tricky. Enough damage to 
> it at four spots will render it pretty much useless. Those spots are 
> directly to the bow, stern, port, and starboard(right word?) sides to 
> the ship.
> 
> OOC: I'm taking these mechanics of shields from Star Trek, if someone 
> thinks they shouldn't imply here, tell me.
